title: IEEE Region 10 Recognition
description: Received the "Outstanding SIGHT Group" award for our innovative approach to community-driven technology solutions across South India.

title: Sustainable Development Goals Impact
description: Successfully aligned all our projects with UN SDGs, directly contributing to Quality Education, Clean Energy, and Clean Water initiatives.

title: Community Partnership Excellence
description: Established partnerships with 8 local NGOs and government agencies, creating a sustainable ecosystem for technology-driven social change.

title: Chapter Establishment
description: Successfully established IEEE SIGHT chapter at CEK, becoming the first SIGHT affiliate in the Kollam district with 25 founding members.
